Dedicated server Auction  

Datacenter in EU (de)
   
Here is details of this server

>    Xeon E3-1230v3,  1xQuad-Core 
>    16 GB DDR3 
>    2x 2,000 GB SATA II
>    1Gbit/s port Unlimited BW (guaranteed 500 Mbit/s bandwidth)
>     1x ipv4 


Expires: 30-April-2014

**Starting bid** 7$

**Bid increments** 5$

Payment accepted via paypal.

Auction ends: 31-March-2014 6h AM/GMT+7
